Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (44.44%) toTemporin-HN1L: 25%; R: 19%.Activity: active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 25923 or ATCC 6538 or RN 4220 or MRSA ATCC 43300 or ATCC 16558 (MIC 7.41-30.86 uM), L. monocytogenes ATCC 19115 (MIC 3.86 uM), B. subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC 1.93 uM). MBC are higher. Gram- bacteria were not tested.
Literature Information.Author: Zhang X, Ma P, Ismail BB, Yang Z, Zou Z, Suo Y, Ye X, Liu D, Guo M.2024
Literature Information.Reference: J Agric Food Chem. 2024 Jan 30. doi: 10.1021/acs.jafc.3c08241.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Chickpea-Derived Modified Antimicrobial Peptides KTA and KTR Inactivate Staphylococcus aureus via Disrupting Cell Membrane and Interfering with Peptidoglycan Synthesis.
